pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenery shot captures a sweeping view of the interior of the Colosseum in Rome. The camera slowly pans across the vast, ruined amphitheater, showing its multiple levels and the tourists scattered throughout. There is no primary subject motion, as the focus is on the grand, historic architecture.
